basic_info.name: Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center Placement
description: ACERC Ajmer has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell that provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The objective of the cell is to enhance their technical and personal skills which help them in getting job opportunities at campus recruitment. Even during the lockdown, it is not like any work has been stopped in the college, online classes were held continuously and many webinars were also conducted.

basic_info.name: Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center Faculty
description: ACERC Ajmer has highly qualified and well experienced faculty. The college has 68 experienced faculties out of which 12 faculties have done their PhD. The faculty members provide guidance to the students and help them achieve their goals in the professional career. The faculty at ACERC have vast years of experience who provide guidance to the students in their studies.

basic_info.name: Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center FAQs

Section.name: About Aryabhatta College of Engineering and Research Center
Section.description:
Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center (ACERC), Ajmer was established in the year 2002 by Aryabhatta Academic Society. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in affiliation with Bikaner Technical University. Admission to the ACERC Ajmer is done based on merit and JEE or GATE qualified candidates.
The college has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell that provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The highest package offered was INR 9 LPA and the average package offered was INR 4.5 LPA. Some of the top recruiters are Dell, GAIL, HDFC Bank, Havells, HP, JCB, JK Cement, L&T, Mittal Group, MP Birla Group and many more.
Check: ACERC Ajmer Reviews

Ques. What is the application procedure at Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center?
Ans. The candidates can apply online or offline mode. To apply online, visit the official website of the college to fill the application form. Submit the duly filled application form along with the mandatory documents.
Ques. What is the intake capacity for admission at Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center?
Ans. The total intake capacity for admission in the B.Tech program at ACERC is 240.
Ques. Do students get industrial exposure at Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center?
Ans. Yes. Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center provides industrial exposure to the students through industrial visit or training to enhance the skills of the students.
Ques. Does ACERC Ajmer offer scholarships?
Ans. Yes, The following scholarships are offered at Aryabhatta College of Engineering & Research Center
